content.text: Learn how to create a responsive blog layout with CSS.
content.html: Learn how to create a responsive blog layout with CSS.

content.text: Learn how to create a responsive blog layout that varies between two and full-width columns depending on screen width.
content.html: Learn how to create a responsive blog layout that varies between two and full-width columns depending on screen width.

content.text: Resize the browser window to see the responsive effect:
content.html: Resize the browser window to see the responsive effect:

content.text: How To Create a Blog Layout

content.code_html:
<div class="header">
  <h2>Blog Name</h2>
</div>

<div class="row">
  <div class="leftcolumn">
    <div class="card">
      <h2>TITLE HEADING</h2>
      <h5>Title description, Dec 7, 2017</h5>
      <div class="fakeimg" style="height:200px;">Image</div>
      <p>Some text..</p>
    </div>
    <div class="card">
      <h2>TITLE HEADING</h2>
      <h5>Title description, Sep 2, 2017</h5>
      <div class="fakeimg" style="height:200px;">Image</div>
      <p>Some text..</p>
    </div>
  </div>
  <div class="rightcolumn">
    <div class="card">
      <h2>About Me</h2>
      <div class="fakeimg" style="height:100px;">Image</div>
      <p>Some text about me in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim..</p>
    </div>
    <div class="card">
      <h3>Popular Post</h3>
      <div class="fakeimg">Image</div><br>
      <div class="fakeimg">Image</div><br>
      <div class="fakeimg">Image</div>
    </div>
    <div class="card">
      <h3>Follow Me</h3>
      <p>Some text..</p>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

<div class="footer">
  <h2>Footer</h2>
</div>

/* Add a

content.code_html:
* {
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

body {
  font-family: Arial;
  padding: 20px;
  background: #f1f1f1;
}

/* Header/Blog Title */
.header {
  padding: 30px;
  font-size: 40px;
  text-align: center;
  background: white;
}

/* Create two unequal columns that floats next to each other */
/* Left column */
.leftcolumn {
  float: left;
  width: 75%;
}

/* Right column */
.rightcolumn {
  float: left;
  width: 25%;
  padding-left: 20px;
}

/* Fake image */
.fakeimg {
  background-color: #aaa;
  width: 100%;
  padding: 20px;
}

/* Add a card effect for articles */
.card {
  background-color: white;
  padding: 20px;
  margin-top: 20px;
}

/* Clear floats after the columns */
.row:after {
  content: "";
  display: table;
  clear: both;
}

/* Footer */
.footer {
  padding: 20px;
  text-align: center;
  background: #ddd;
  margin-top: 20px;
}

/* Responsive layout - when the screen is less than 800px wide, make the two columns stack on top of each other instead of next to each other */
@media screen and (max-width: 800px) {
  .leftcolumn, .rightcolumn {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 0;
  }
}
